verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, what is the <S%H1612>vine<s%> - <S%H6086>tree<s%> more than any <S%H6086>tree<s%>, the <S%H2156>vine-branch<s%> which is among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>?

Shall <S%H6086>wood<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> thereof to <S%H6213>make<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%>? or will men <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H3489>pin<s%> of it to <S%H8518>hang<s%> any vessel <S%H3627>thereon<s%>?

Behold <S%H5414><s%>, it is cast into the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H402>fuel<s%>; the <S%H784>fire<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of <S%H8432>it<s%>, and the midst of it is <S%H2787>burned<s%>: is it <S%H6743>profitable<s%> for any <S%H4399>work<s%>?

Behold <S%H8549><s%>, when it was whole, it was <S%H6213>meet<s%> for no <S%H4399>work<s%>: how much <S%H784>less<s%>, when the fire hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H2787>it<s%>, and it is burned, shall it yet be <S%H6213>meet<s%> for any <S%H4399>work<s%>!

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: As the <S%H1612>vine<s%> - <S%H6086>tree<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H402>fuel<s%>, so will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H3318>them<s%>; they shall go forth from the <S%H784>fire<s%>, but the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>; and ye shall know that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when I <S%H7760>set<s%> my face against <S%H6440>them<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, because they have <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
